result.value: A web application for managing and executing WES services.

- **User manual**
  - [HackMD - sapporo-web Document](https://hackmd.io/@suecharo/sapporo-web-docs)
- **日本語での使い方解説**
  - [HackMD - sapporo-web Japanese Document](https://hackmd.io/@suecharo/sapporo-web-docs-ja)
- GitHub repository of sapporo project
  - [GitHub - sapporo-wes/sapporo](https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo)
- GitHub repository of sapporo-service (WES service)
  - [GitHub - sapporo-wes/sapporo-service](https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo-service)

Please note that this repository is participating in a study into sustainability of open source projects.
Data will be gathered about this repository for approximately the next 12 months, starting from 2021-06-16. 
Data collected will include number of contributors, number of PRs, time taken to close/merge these PRs, and issues closed.

A web application for managing and executing WES services. Multiple WES services can be registered. **_[sapporo-web](https://sapporo-wes.github.io/sapporo-web/) deployed to GitHub Pages (Recommended using the Google Chrome browser)_** - **User manual** - [HackMD - sapporo-web Document](https://hackmd.io/@suecharo/sapporo-web-docs) - **日本語での使い方解説** - [HackMD - sapporo-web Japanese Document](https://hackmd.io/@suecharo/sapporo-web-docs-ja) - GitHub repository of sapporo project - [GitHub - sapporo-wes/sapporo](https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo) - GitHub repository of sapporo-service (WES service) - [GitHub - sapporo-wes/sapporo-service](https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo-service)

result.description:
## What's Changed

- Allow read-only text area to be copied by @kinow in https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo-web/pull/36
- Fix a bug related to `Attach as File` workflow (cc2f2f1) reported by @kinow in https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo-web/issues/35
- Fix a bug that caused the Add Workflow button to stop working after pressing the ESC key (4636578) reported by @kinow in https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo-web/issues/34
- Fix form text area bug (4c356b9) reported by @kinow in https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo-web/issues/32
- Display HTTP errors in the UI (73b9c69) reported by @kinow in https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo-web/issues/30, https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo-web/issues/31
- Add feature to display the endpoint's news (68d4906)
- Fix Docs button (2253765 )
- Fix some typos and minor bugs
- Change from `yarn` -> `npm`
- Fix overall npm package and dependency

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo-web/compare/1.1.2...1.2.0

- 47226ff Add feature to set default wf engine
- 9f2a2c4 Add feature to generate form for CWL workflow

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo-web/compare/1.1.0...1.1.1

- Support `sapporo-wes 1.0.1`
- Fix TRS import feature
- Add feature to make-template by cwltool and to complement by default_engine_params

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo-web/compare/1.0.13...1.1.0

- Fix ignoring endpoint trailing slash in the process of getting `service-info`
-   Support for `cwl-wes`

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo-web/compare/1.0.11...1.0.12

- Bug fix for pre-registered service
- Switch from `axios` to fetch API
- Support for firefox and safari

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sapporo-wes/sapporo-web/compare/1.0.10...1.0.11
-  Changed the name 'sapporo' to all lowercase.

- Updated the GitHub Actions
- Updated Docker environment
- Added pre-registered batch.
- Added a bomb icon to the force clear state button.
- Added a button to check the connection of WES Service.
- Maintained the dependency packages of node.js

- Fix github pages deploy actions
- Added the feature to dump the state in the state page.
- Added auto-update function for Run Page
- Added a link to SAPPORO-service
- Added the feature to disable the button when Submit or Register button is pressed

- Added a footer
- Added github action for deployment
- Added icon and favicon
- Added some tooltips
- Added the feature to copy run id
- Added the feature to download output files
- Added the feature to download the execution log
- Added the feature to import run
- Added the feature to load pre-registered services
- Added the feature to pass workflow attachments as remote URLs
- Brushed up the store implementation
- Changed native nuxt to be used instead of nuxt-typescript-run-time
- Fixed a bug in table select
- Fixed a bug in table sorting
- Fixed behavior of service update
- Fixed behavior of workflow update
- Fixed for reactive changes of state
- Fixed overall text
- Fixed overall UI
- Fixed the deploy command
- Removed the feature to manipulate state from header
